summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Jones Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street; Twenty-fourth Avenue Northwest, Twenty-third Avenue Northwest and Twenty-second Avenue Northwest, each from West Seventieth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, and West Seventy-third Street, from Nineteenth Avenue Northwest to Twenty-fourth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary crosswalks and surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1689 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
